Combining  our  answers  to  the  above  questions  with  other
notes  and  observations,  we  developed  a  list  of  salient
themes emerging from our discussions of the papers.

After reading all the papers in our corpus, we conducted an
analysis  based  on  a  grounded  theory  approach  [27].

These memos, and the themes they describe, form the
basis for the following sections.

Combining  our  answers  to  the  above  questions  with  other
notes  and  observations,  we  developed  a  list  of  salient
themes emerging from our discussions of the papers.

After reading all the papers in our corpus, we conducted an
analysis  based  on  a  grounded  theory  approach  [27].

These memos, and the themes they describe, form the
basis for the following sections.
